content: संहिता {@--1@} Combination, union, conjunction. {@--2@} A collection, compilation, compendium. {@--3@} Any systematically arranged collection of texts or verses. {@--4@} A compendium or compilation of laws, code, digest; मनुसंहिता. {@--5@} The continuous hymnical text of the Veda as formed out of the Padas or individual words by proper phonetic changes according to different Śākhās or schools; पदप्रकृतिः सहिता <ls>Nir.</ls> {@--6@} (In gram) Compination or junction of letters according to the rules of Saṃdhi or euphony; परः संनिकर्षः संहिता <ls>P. I. 4. 109</ls>; वर्णानामतिशयितः संनिधिः संहितासंज्ञः स्यात् <ls>Sk.</ls>; or वर्णानामे कप्राणयोगः संहिता. {@--7@} The Supreme Being who hold and supports the universe.
